00020 #include "rusarvictimdata.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00023 
00024 RDK2_FACTORY(RUsarVictimData);
00025     
00026 using namespace std;
00027 using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00028     
00029 void RUsarVictimData::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00030 {
00031     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00032         w->writeString(sensorName);
00033         w->writeString(partName);
00034         w->write_f32(location.x);
00035         w->write_f32(location.y);
00036         w->write_f32(location.z);
00037         w->write_f32(timestamp.getSeconds());
00038     w->doneWriting();
00039 }
00040     
00041 void RUsarVictimData::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00042 {
00043     r->startReading(getClassName());
00044         sensorName = r->readString();
00045         partName = r->readString();
00046         location.x = r->read_f32();
00047         location.y = r->read_f32();
00048         location.z = r->read_f32();
00049         timestamp.setSeconds(r->read_f32());
00050     r->doneReading();
00051 }
00052
